feature1.explanation: Both texts exhibit the use of parentheses and hyphens, which suggests a similarity in punctuation style.

feature2.explanation: Both texts show a similar level of lexical variation and word choice, indicating a common writing style.

feature3.explanation: The sentence structures in both texts are relatively short and straightforward, lacking complexity, which could suggest a shared writing style.

feature4.explanation: In terms of text and discourse features, both texts convey a similar tone and mood, contributing to the likelihood of being written by the same author.

feature5.explanation: There are no spelling or typographical errors apparent in either text, indicating a level of consistency in writing quality.

overall.explanation: Taking into account the commonalities in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, as well as text and discourse features, along with the absence of spelling errors, there is a moderate to high likelihood that the two texts were written by the same author.
